class.name: HTMLParserAttribute
class.brief_description: [HTMLParser] stores html attributes using this class.
class.description: [HTMLParser] stores html attributes using this class. It has helper methods for searching and modifying data.

method.name: contains_data
method.description: Returns whether the data contains the given string.

method.name: convert_to_string
method.description: The HTML attribute can be turned back into well formatted HTML using this method.

method.name: match_attrib
method.description: It the attribute name equals the given string?

method.name: match_data
method.description: It the data contained equals the given string?

members.member: Is this an attribute vithout a value?
